Articles.Content: just wondering if we will get ksp weekly updates for the tuesdays during which the servers where sh*tting themselves... also the entire articles section is gone.
I can't access the dev articles.

just wondering if we will get ksp weekly updates for the tuesdays during which the servers where sh*tting themselves... also the entire articles section is gone.

I don't know...

The thing with KSP Weekly... Initially, it was positioned like "We'd post here everything devs have posted anywhere for the last week, so you don't have to read thru reddit, watch all the KSPTV streams, Nova's twitter and KSP facebook page to get all the new info". Then it turned quickly into "This would be another source you need to check out to get all the new info". And now after this DLC thing we might get even less new info about game development process. I don't like where this is going.
